name: include
description: Include certain buttons. Buttons order will be as you type it, default: [all buttons]

name: theme
description: Set buttons theme name, default: null

name: title
description: Override title meta tag, default: null

name: description
description: Override description meta tag, default: null

name: image
description: Override image meta tag, default: null

name: tags
description: Override tags for Tumblr and Twitter, default: null

name: gaTracking
description: Roll sharing stats automatically into your Google Analytics, default: false

name: twitterAccount
description: Add via @accountName at the end of the tweets, default: null
